data.name: HintAutoStart
data.value: Automatically start Bookpouch during the computer boot and minimize it into tray

data.name: HintBookGridFavorite
data.value: Toggle to mark this book as one of your favorites.

data.name: HintBookGridSync
data.value: Toggle to decide if you want to sync this book to your reader or not.

data.name: HintEditBookCoverImage
data.value: Cover image for this book. You can select another image by clicking on this picture, or remove the existing image by right clicking on it.

data.value: Mark this book as one of your favorites

data.value: Remove this book from the library

data.name: HintMenuAbout
data.value: About

data.name: HintMenuAdd
data.value: Add new books into the library

data.name: HintMenuRegenerateTree
data.value: Re-generate the book file tree. (Use this, if you manually manipulated with folders included in the library)

data.name: HintMenuSettings
data.value: Settings

data.name: HintMenuSync
data.value: Synchronize files on the connected ebook reader with local Bookpouch library

data.name: HintOnlyOne
data.value: Only allow one instance of Bookpouch to run at the same time

data.name: HintSettingsAutosync
data.value: Automatically start sync, when compatible reader is connected to the computer

data.name: HintSettingsBooksDir
data.value: Directory in which Bookpouch searches for book files to work with.

data.name: HintSettingsDebug
data.value: Debug console displays runtime information about this application, this information will be probably of no use to you as an user.

data.name: HintSettingsDir
data.value: Directory on the device, where all the books are stored. This is the directory which Bookpouch will use, while working with the device.

data.name: HintSettingsModel
data.value: Model name of the reader device, usually identical to the marketing name of the reader. (For example: kindle's model name is kindle)

data.name: HintSettingsPnp
data.value: Device's Plug and play ID. Usually identical to the model name. But it can differ.

data.name: HintSettingsReader
data.value: Select the reader with which you are going to be using the Bookpouch

data.name: HintSettingsSplashscreen
data.value: Show splashscreen while the application loads

data.name: HintSettingsTray
data.value: Closing this application causes it to minimize itself into the system tray instead. (AutoSync will be still working this way)
